import React from "react"; import s from "./Lessons.module.css"; import sprite from "../../img/icomoon/sprite.svg"; import Scrollspy from "react-scrollspy"; import Arrey1 from "../../img/Arrey1.png"; import Hello_World from "../../img/Hello World.png"; import Hello2 from "../../img/Hello2.png"; import link from "../../img/link.png"; import Java from "../../img/Java.png"; import pop from "../../img/pop.png"; import push from "../../img/push.png"; import push2 from "../../img/push2.png"; import slice from "../../img/slice.png"; import splice1 from "../../img/splice1.png"; import splice2 from "../../img/splice2.png"; import splice3 from "../../img/splice3.png"; const Arrey = () => { return (

                `}

                `}

            console.log(lastElementIndex); // 2
            console.log(clients[lastElementIndex]); // "Ajax"
                `}

    for , . 

              {`

            for (let i = 0; i < clients.length; i += 1) {
              console.log(clients[i]);
            }
                `}

              {`
            const clients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly"];

            for (const client of clients) {
              console.log(client);
            }

            const string = "javascript";

            for (const character of string) {
              console.log(character);
            }
                `}

    break continue

    ' , - , , . 

              {`
            const clients = ["Mango", "Poly", "Ajax"];
            const clientNameToFind = "Poly";
            let message;

            for (const client of clients) {
              //          
              //  .       message 
              //     break    
              if (client === clientNameToFind) {
                message = "       !";
                break;
              }

              //        message    
              message = "       !";
            }

            console.log(message); // "       !"
                `}

    message , , '. break , 10000 , 2, 9998 , . 

              {`
            const clients = ["Mango", "Poly", "Ajax"];
            const clientNameToFind = "Poly";
            let message = "       !";

            for (const client of clients) {
              if (client === clientNameToFind) {
                message = "       !";
                break;
              }
              //   ,       
            }

            console.log(message); //        
                `}

    . 

              {`
          const numbers = [1, 3, 14, 18, 4, 7, 29, 6, 34];
          const threshold = 15;

          //       continue,   
          //      .
          for (let i = 0; i < numbers.length; i += 1) {
              if (numbers[i] < threshold) {
              continue;
          } 
          console.log(\`   ${"threshold"}: ${"numbers[i]"}\`); // 18, 29, 34
        }
        
          `}

    , . : ,{" "} , , null {" "} undefined, ,{" "} (by value).

              {`
            let a = 5;
            //   ,  '     
            //      5
            let b = a;
            console.log(a); // 5
            console.log(b); // 5

            //   a
            a = 10;
            console.log(a); // 10
            //  b   ,    
            console.log(b); // 5
                `}

    - ', , , '. 

              {`
            const a = ["Mango"];
            //   a  ,  b    
            //   '.  a  b      .
            const b = a;
            console.log(a); // ["Mango"]
            console.log(b); // ["Mango"]

            //  ,    ,    a
            a.push("Poly");
            console.log(a); // ["Mango", "Poly"]

            // b  ,   b,   a,
            //           '
            console.log(b); // ["Mango", "Poly"]

            //  
            b.push("Ajax");
            console.log(a); // ["Mango", "Poly", "Ajax"]
            console.log(b); // ["Mango", "Poly", "Ajax"]
                `}

    split() join()

    split(delimiter) , delimiter. , . . 

              {`
            const name = "Mango";
            console.log(name.split("")); // ["M", "a", "n", "g", "o"]

            const message = "JavaScript  ";
            console.log(message.split(" ")); // ["JavaScript", "", ""]
                `}

    join(delimiter) ' . , delimiter. split(delimiter). 

              {`
            const words = ["JavaScript", "", ""];
            console.log(words.join("")); // "JavaScript"
            console.log(words.join(" ")); // "JavaScript  "
            console.log(words.join("-")); // "JavaScript--"
                `}

    indexOf()

    indexOf(value) , value , {" "} -1 . indexOf , . 

              {`
            const clients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"];
            console.log(clients.indexOf("Poly")); // 2
            console.log(clients.indexOf("Monkong")); // -1
                `}

    includes()

    includes(value) value true false . , , (). 

              {`
            const clients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"];
            console.log(clients.includes("Poly")); // true
            console.log(clients.includes("Monkong")); // false
                `}
    includes()

              {`

            }

    , , (cherry) (cranberries)? ||?

            const fruit = "apple";

            if (
              fruit === "apple" ||
              fruit === "strawberry" ||
              fruit === "cherry" ||
              fruit === "cranberries"
            ) {
              console.log("It is a red fruit!");
            }
                `}

    {" "} includes() , . 

              {`
            //    
            const redFruits = ["apple", "strawberry", "cherry", "cranberries"];
            const fruit = "cherry";
            //   
            const hasFruit = redFruits.includes(fruit);

            if (hasFruit) {
              console.log(${"fruit"} is a red fruit!\`);
            }
                `}

    push() pop()

    . .

    push() , , . . 

              {`
            const numbers = [];

            numbers.push(1);
            console.log(numbers); // [1]

            numbers.push(2);
            console.log(numbers); // [1, 2]

            numbers.push(3);
            console.log(numbers); // [1, 2, 3]

            numbers.push(4);
            console.log(numbers); // [1, 2, 3, 4]

            numbers.push(5);
            console.log(numbers); // [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
                `}

    pop() . , undefined. 

              {`
            const numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];

            console.log(numbers.pop()); //  5
            console.log(numbers); // [1, 2, 3, 4]

            console.log(numbers.pop()); //  4
            console.log(numbers); // [1, 2, 3]

            console.log(numbers.pop()); //  3
            console.log(numbers); // [1, 2]

            console.log(numbers.pop()); //  2
            console.log(numbers); // [1]

            console.log(numbers.pop()); //  1
            console.log(numbers); // []
                `}

    slice()

    slice(begin, end) , , . begin , end - . 

              {`
          const clients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"];
          console.log(clients.slice(1, 3)); // ["Ajax", "Poly"]
                `}

    begin end , . 

              {`
            const clients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"];
            console.log(clients.slice()); // ["Mango", Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"]
                `}

    end, {" "} start . 

              {`
            const clients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"];
            console.log(clients.slice(1)); // ["Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"]
            console.log(clients.slice(2)); // ["Poly", "Kiwi"]
                `}

    start , end , start 

              {`
          const clients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"];
          console.log(clients.slice(-2)); // ["Poly", "Kiwi"]
                `}

    splice()

    , . , .

    , .

          splice(position, num)
                `}
    • position - ()
    • num - ,

    splice , . , , ' 1 5. 

              {`
            const scores = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];

            //     ,     ( 0)
            const deletedScores = scores.splice(0, 3);

            //   scores   
            console.log(scores); // [4, 5]

            //   deletedScores    
            console.log(deletedScores); // [1, 2, 3]
                `}

            const colors = ["red", "green", "blue"];

            colors.splice(2, 0, "purple");
            console.log(colors); // ["red", "green", "purple", "blue"]
                `}

    {" "} colors.splice(2, 0, 'purple') .

    , , ' .. 

              {`
            const colors = ["red", "green", "blue"];

            colors.splice(1, 0, "yellow", "pink");
            console.log(colors); // ["red", "yellow", "pink", "green", "blue"]
                `}

    , . . , , . 

              {`
            splice(position, num, new_element_1, new_element_2, ...)
                `}
    • position - ()
    • num - ,
    • , , .

    , .

              {`
            const languages = ["C", "C++", "Java", "JavaScript"];

            //     1  
            languages.splice(1, 1, "Python");
            console.log(languages); // ["C", "Python", "Java", "JavaScript"]

            //    (  2)  
            languages.splice(2, 1, "C#", "Swift", "Go");
            console.log(languages); // ["C", "Python", "C#", "Swift", "Go", "JavaScript"]
                `}

    {" "} languages.splice(1, 1, 'Python') .

    concat()

    . , , . . 

              {`
            const oldClients = ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"];
            const newClients = ["Monkong", "Singu"];

            const allClientsWithOldFirst = oldClients.concat(newClients);
            console.log(allClientsWithOldFirst); // ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi", "Monkong", "Singu"]

            const allClientsWithNewFirst = newClients.concat(oldClients);
            console.log(allClientsWithNewFirst); // ["Monkong", "Singu", "Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"]

            console.log(oldClients); // ["Mango", "Ajax", "Poly", "Kiwi"]
            console.log(newClients); // ["Monkong", "Singu"]
                `}
    ); }; export default Arrey;
